bibl.title: A Note on Certain Inscriptions at Gebel Dokhan, and on a Small Station, hitherto Unrecorded, on the Road from Kainopolis to Myos Hormos.
bibl.note: Une dédicace et des proscynèmes de l'époque romaine; - la fondation de l'"Église catholique de Mélitios" (IVe siècle p.C.).
bibl.seg: Scaife C.H.O., A Note on Certain Inscriptions at Gebel Dokhan, and on a Small Station, hitherto Unrecorded, on the Road from Kainopolis to Myos Hormos.
